sense.def:
A handout
je denar, obleka ali hrana, ki jo zastonj damo revnim ljudem.

seg.quote: We said that we wouldn't be relying on handouts from anyone for our future.

sense.def:
A handout
je tudi listina, ki nam daje podatke o neki organizaciji ali dogodku.

seg.quote: ...a pile of unread public relations handouts and shiny magazines.
